item.title: New Undergraduate Research Project (URP) and Undergraduate Independent Study (UIS) Registration Process
item.description: Beginning Fall 2025, undergraduate students will no longer submit physical forms to register for URP and/or UIS courses. Instead, students will register online via the Student Information System (SIS)! For more information on this exciting change, please visit the Office of the Registrar website! https://registrar.rpi.edu/services/course-registration/undergraduate-research-and-independent-study

item.title: Move Together: RPI Run/Walk Meetups for the Workforce Challenge | April 30
item.description:
Date: Wednesday, April 30, 2025 5:00 PM - 5:45 PM - Get ready to step into the Workforce Challenge with RPI’s Run/Walk Training Program! Whether you’re a seasoned runner, a casual walker, or somewhere in between, all paces and abilities are welcome. Join us at the ’86 Field: Wed @ 5 PM (April 30, May 7) & Mon @ Noon (May 5, 12) for a casual 30–45 minute meetup to build fitness, connect with colleagues, and have fun—no experience necessary. Move your body, meet your community!

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
